ref: 3643 *kṣaṇati ʻ is sifted, is strained, falls ʼ. 2. Pp. *kṣata -- 2. 3. *kṣaṇana -- ʻ the being sifted etc. ʼ. 4. Caus. *kṣāṇayati. 5. Pp. *kṣāṇita -- . 6. *kṣāṇa -- 2. 7. *kṣāṇana -- . [Cf. MIr. šan -- , past st. šata -- ʻ to spread, scatter, shake, pour out ʼ H. W. Bailey BSOS vii 777 and Morgenstierne IIFL ii 209. MIr. š -- poss. < OIr. š -- or xš -- , i.e. IE. k̂s -- or qs -- . Kaf. č -- < IE. qs -- . Paš. forms with čh -- are ← Ind. which, with possible exception of K. with ch (not ċh) and S. with kh -- , has generalized ch -- . -- √*kṣan2]
Kho. c̣honik ʻ to beat down, shake down ʼ (BelvalkarVol 89 < kṣaṇṓti with which it collides);
K. chanun ʻ to be sifted ʼ;
S. chaṇaṇu ʻ to be strained (whence tr. to strain), to drop (of fruit) ʼ;
P. chaṇnā ʻ to be sifted ʼ;
H. channā ʻ to be strained ʼ;
G. chaṇvũ ʻ to filter, strain ʼ (tr. < intr. after past); -- prob.
S. khaṇaṇu ʻ to lift, take up ʼ assuming semantic change: ʻ sift -- toss up <-> lift ʼ?
